main.name: Sai Charan Katkam
main.description: Enthusiast cyber security analyst and competent Front End Developer, Junior ReactJS professional with 2 years of commercial experience and skills in achieving greater organizational efficiency & profitability. Seeking a challenging career in an organization that provides me with the opportunity to demonstrate my skills and improve my knowledge and be a part of your team that works dynamically towards the goals of the organization.
main.bio: My name is Sai Charan Katkam, I'm a Graduate Cyber Security Analyst, IT Support Technician and front end Developer. I am working in The Jobshareskill.org as a IT Support technician and I am Graduated in cyber security government funded Bootcamp in HyperionDev.I enjoy being challenged and engaged with projects that require me to work beyond my comfort and knowledge set, as I get to explore and learn new languages with different development techniques which are important for growth of any professional like me as well as the success of any organisation.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: My proficiency in technologies that I used while developing production level applications

work.title: It Support Technician
work.description: I create and manage technical documentation for fellow JSS members while conducting research and developing knowledge base articles for IT support skills on LinkedIn. Additionally, I excel in fostering and maintaining effective relationships with team members. My expertise extends to client and server systems, particularly in utilizing Active Directory and Domain Controllers. Moreover, I possess proficiency in tracing and reviewing crucial account information within Office 365.

work.title: Junior Cyber security Analyst(Intern)
work.description: I have acquired proficiency in key cybersecurity tools such as Burp Suite for web application security testing, Kali Linux for penetration testing and ethical hacking, Metasploit Framework for penetration testing and exploit development, and Wireshark for network traffic analysis and troubleshooting. My experience includes conducting ethical hacking exercises and vulnerability assessments, responsibly identifying and reporting security vulnerabilities, and actively participating in bug bounty programs. I have also enrolled in relevant cybersecurity courses, workshops, and certifications, dedicating time to self-study to grasp cybersecurity fundamentals and best practices. My commitment to continuous learning is evident through the maintenance of detailed records of my cybersecurity learning journey, experiments, and findings, as well as my practice in creating clear and concise reports of ethical hacking activities. I have engaged with the cybersecurity community through forums, online communities, and local meetups, collaborating with peers on challenges and knowledge sharing. My focus on personal and professional security awareness ensures that all ethical hacking activities are conducted legally and ethically. I am diligently preparing for foundational certifications like CompTIA Security+ and Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) to validate my cybersecurity skills and seek mentorship from experienced cybersecurity professionals. Additionally, I have utilized a variety of online resources, blogs, and books to supplement my cybersecurity education.

work.title: Javascript Developer
work.description: Working with Automobile client website project using tools React Js components, Redux, Redux-Form, React-Router,JQuery, Typescript,ImmutableJS, and jQuery-UI,

work.title: Junior React Developer- Freelancer
work.description: Developing new user-facing features using ReactJS. Building reusable components and front end libraries for future use. Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code. Experience with popular ReactJS workflows (such as Redux_ToolKit & Flux). Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM. Familiarity with RestFul APIâ€™s

work.company: Quest Employement Limited(Amazon Logistics United Kingdom).
work.title: Warehouse Associate
work.description: Overseeing and managing the selection and handling of orders. Ensuring that products and/or merchandise are packed neatly and securely. Ensuring that all warehouse operations are well-maintained and managed. Loading and unloading Amazon merchandise trucks. Operating stock management tools such as forklift and so on. Ensuring that the warehouse space is well-organized and managed. Driving trucks, vans, and/or cars with warehouse materials when required. Storing and managing data in inventory and logistic software programs.

work.description: Static Webites(HTML, CSS, Javascript), Framworks( Boostrap 4, JQuery, React.js, Express.js),Back-end(node.js, APIs)

projects.title: SOC Automation Lab Project
projects.category: Security Operations Center (SOC) automation project (home lab). Explore how automation enhances incident response, accelerates threat detection, and streamlines SOC workflows. Dive into the details of this hands-on, budget-friendly project (home lab) and empower your cybersecurity arsenal

projects.title: Active Directory Lab Project
projects.category: Guide for the steps of setting up an Active Directory (home lab) that includes Splunk, Kali Linux & Atomic Red Team. Explore how a domain environment works, learn how to ingest events to a SIEM and generate telemetry related to attacks seen in the wild to help you detect them in the future.

testimonials.text: Sai charan has been a very hard working and dependable consultant. He understands the business requirements and goes extra mile to deliver it. Highly professional and great value add to any team.
testimonials.user: Venkatesh, Ex-Principal Consultant at Bhaskara Info

testimonials.text: I had worked with Sai charan in Bhaskara Info Services for more than 1 year, I was senior to him. I had the pleasure of working with him. His dedication toward his work was outstanding and he always had positive attitude toward new learning. He is dedicated, self-motivated, trustworthy, independent and very capable. Nitish would be an asset to any Company.
testimonials.user: Praveen Gubbala, Technology Lead at Bhaskara Info.
